# Test Failures

This directory contains automatically generated test failure reports from the `collect-failures` workflow.

## Files

- **latest.md** - Most recent test failure summary (auto-generated and committed by workflow)

## For AI Agents

When asked to fix test failures, read `.github/test-failures/latest.md` to see the extracted error text from the latest test run. This file is automatically updated on each PR commit and contains only the relevant error details (test summaries, error messages) without cleanup text or process exit errors.

## For Humans

This file is updated automatically by the collect-failures workflow. Check it to see what tests are failing without having to dig through workflow logs.
